channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Protesters at Taiwan's Legislature Say They'll Be Back
item.description: Protesters are promising further action outside Taiwan's legislature from Friday as the two main opposition parties seek to use their majority to push through reforms that would ex

item.title: Police Step Up Patrols on Metro Networks After Taichung Stabbing
item.description: Police are stepping up patrols on Taiwan's metro networks after a stabbing on Taichung's metro.

item.title: Fresh Protests Against Legislative Reforms Planned for Friday
